I can't seem to reproduce this (using exact same build) ... did you 
happen to update your EMF installed runtime, or anything else "custom"?
David, Yes, I am using the 1209 EMF build.

Ok, I quickly tried in dev. env. with new EMF/SDO/XSD in target, and all 
seemed fine ... so, I suspect there's something in EMF/SDO that's not "binary
compatible". If you'd like to track that down, please do, otherwise, please
re-test when new EMF package in a build, and re-open if you still see the problem.
Reopening, in order to put into a valid closed state as remind is now deprecated, and closed, remind, does not make much sense.

Resolving as won't fix, as these had previously been closed out, if this is incorrect, please provide more data and reopen.

Thanks,
